protective_factors: Explicit denial of intent to act
Denial of history of past attempts or preparatory acts (Safety Triage confirmation)
Strong perceived responsibility/attachment to family (Husband, kids) cited as barrier to action
risk_factors: Presence of passive death ideation ('Wish I could disappear')
Feelings of worthlessness and guilt (Failure, letting others down)
clinical_actions: Confirmed low risk (C-SSRS Max Ideation 1) warranting close outpatient management.
Monitor ideation closely following medication adjustment.
Reinforce protective factors and review crisis contact plan.
